name: RNG GOLF PARTY
description:
RNG Golf is a multiplayer golf game to play with up to 4 friends. Randomly generated music, Randomly generated golf clubs, Randomly generated Fun!!!

This will literally be the game to end all games. Once you pick it up you won’t be able to put it down. Your kids will thank you. Your parents will finally be proud of you. You will find the love of your life. You will actually have friends. You will dream about golf. Take the red pill.

Features:

  • Normal golf rules
  • Art Style Direction: Green Hill Zone
  • 1 Playable Generic Mascot:
    • Think of 70-80s cereal mascots
  • Banger randomly generated music!
